replies.msg:
我有17年既Data

呢份野係要將Duplicated rows Delete (要留低一行)

依家我做到每一張worksheet一個msgbox去delete duplicate row

我有兩個問題跪求解答

1.總共有19張worksheet, 我要入咩coding先可以skip走頭兩張sheet, 禁一個msgbox制就由第三張開始Delete

2.我delete完仲要用msgbox顯示返刪走左幾多rows, 依家我做到既係彈出17個msgbox，分別顯示每一年remove左幾多行，點樣先一個msgbox可以顯示咁多張sheet總共刪左幾多行？

for each sht in thisworkbook.sheets
if sht.name <> “第一張sheet個名” and sht.name <> “第二張sheet個名” then
做你想做嘅野
end if
next

replies.msg:
唔該哂
高手 咁你識唔識第2個問題？

呢個係我自己整出黎，但係佢會彈17個msgbox出黎，顯示每一張刪左幾多row. 加上呢個skip唔到一開始個兩張sheet. 上面個方法我套唔到落去

Sub WorksheetLoop2()

Dim Current As Worksheet
Dim Row0 As Long, Row1 As Long

For Each Current In Worksheets

With Current
Row0 = .Cells(1048576, 1).End(xlUp).Row
.UsedRange.RemoveDuplicates Columns:=Array(3, 4, 5, 6), Header:=xlYe
Row1 = .Cells(1048576, 1).End(xlUp).Row
End With
MsgBox Current.Name & "Total " & Row0 - Row1 & " cars have been remove", vbInformation, "Information"

Next

End Sub
